name: samsaara
description: A comprehensive module to create, maintain and manage active socket connections.

scripts.test: cp ./node_modules/mocha/mocha.css ./test       && cp ./node_modules/mocha/mocha.js ./test       && cp ./node_modules/chai/chai.js ./test       && (node test/test.js & sleep 3; ./node_modules/mocha-phantomjs/bin/mocha-phantomjs --local-storage-path=./ http://localhost:9999/testRunner.html)
